Subject: Email notification don't working
Description: I have added the correct credentials and configuration for MS Exchange Online. Emails are sending inconsistently. Can we perform a debugging session to identify where exactly the issue is?
What_We_Know__c:
2025.05.29
The customer configured their MS Exchange SMTP email account on Endpoint Protector but were complaining that emails are sending inconsistently. I sent the customer a screenshot of the recommended configuration of a MS Exchange SMTP email account and the customer responded to say that their SMTP emails are working fine since making the necessary changes on their side to match our configuration in the screenshot.
Next_Steps__c:
2025.05.29
Since the customer confirmed that the issue is solved after modifying their SMTP configurations, we can now close this case.
